name: Pipe Panic (Frozen Well Studios)
description:
This is my entry for Game Jam 192 pt2.

The "Water Levels are Rising" and have flooded your ship because the pipes to the pump are broken, you must fix said pipes and then switch the pump on to drain the water and refloat your ship.

Controls

WASD or Arrows to move

ctrl or space to interact with pipes and the pump
